review: good movie, but not great like the legend of bhagat singh. i would’ve gave this movie 3 stars if characters like sukhdev and rajguru had more footage in the movie. bhagat singh’s struggle was incomplete without these two characters. this movie did not show how bhagat singh incarceration and his hunger strike influenced public. the biggest flaw in this movie was when chandrashekar died. in the movie police officers shot chandrashekhar, but in real he shot himself. political rallies and politics like nehru and gandhi’s stance on bhagat singh’s ideology was not shown like it was shown in the legend of bhagat. finally, the legend of bhagat singh was the winner all the way. as for shaheed, i would rate this movie 2.5/5.
